verses.verse: My <S%H1121>son<s%>, if you be <S%H6148>sure<s%> for your <S%H7453>friend<s%>, if you have <S%H8628>struck<s%> your <S%H3709>hand<s%> with a <S%H2114>stranger<s%>,
You are <S%H3369>snared<s%> with the <S%H561>words<s%> of your <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, you are <S%H3920>taken<s%> with the <S%H561>words<s%> of your <S%H6310>mouth<s%>.

<S%H6213>Do<s%> this <S%H645>now<s%>, my <S%H1121>son<s%>, and <S%H5337>deliver<s%> <S%H935>yourself<s%>, when you are come into the <S%H3709>hand<s%> of your <S%H7453>friend<s%>; <S%H3212>go<s%>, <S%H7511>humble<s%> <S%H7292>yourself<s%>, and urge your <S%H7453>friend<s%>.
<S%H5414>Give<s%> not <S%H8142>sleep<s%> to your <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, nor <S%H8572>slumber<s%> to your <S%H6079>eyelids<s%>.
<S%H5337>Deliver<s%> yourself as a <S%H6643>roe<s%> from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6833>hunter<s%>, and as a bird from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3353>fowler<s%>.
<S%H3212>Go<s%> to the <S%H5244>ant<s%>, you <S%H6102>sluggard<s%>; <S%H7200>consider<s%> her <S%H1870>ways<s%>, and be <S%H2449>wise<s%>:
Which having no <S%H7101>guide<s%>, <S%H7860>overseer<s%>, or <S%H4910>ruler<s%>,
<S%H3559>Provides<s%> her <S%H3899>food<s%> in the <S%H7019>summer<s%>, and <S%H103>gathers<s%> her <S%H3978>food<s%> in the <S%H7105>harvest<s%>.
How long will you <S%H7901>sleep<s%>, O <S%H6102>sluggard<s%>? when will you <S%H6965>arise<s%> out of your <S%H8142>sleep<s%>?
Yet a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H8142>sleep<s%>, a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H8572>slumber<s%>, a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H2264>folding<s%> of the <S%H3027>hands<s%> to <S%H7901>sleep<s%>:
So shall your <S%H7389>poverty<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> as one that <S%H1980>travels<s%>, and your <S%H4270>want<s%> as a <S%H4043>armed<s%> <S%H376>man<s%>.
A <S%H1100>naughty<s%> <S%H120>person<s%>, a <S%H205>wicked<s%> <S%H376>man<s%>, <S%H1980>walks<s%> with a <S%H6143>perverse<s%> <S%H6310>mouth<s%>.
He <S%H7169>winks<s%> with his <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, he <S%H4448>speaks<s%> with his <S%H7272>feet<s%>, he <S%H3384>teaches<s%> with his <S%H676>fingers<s%>;
<S%H8419>Perversity<s%> is in his <S%H3820>heart<s%>, he <S%H2790>devises<s%> <S%H7451>mischief<s%> <S%H6256>continually<s%>; he <S%H7971>sows<s%> <S%H4066>discord<s%>.
Therefore shall his <S%H343>calamity<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H6597>suddenly<s%>; <S%H6621>suddenly<s%> shall he be <S%H7665>broken<s%> without <S%H4832>remedy<s%>.
These <S%H8337>six<s%> things does the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H8130>hate<s%>: <S%H7651>Yes<s%>, seven are a <S%H8441>abomination<s%> unto <S%H5315>him<s%>:
A <S%H7311>proud<s%> <S%H5869>look<s%>, a <S%H8267>lying<s%> <S%H3956>tongue<s%>, and <S%H3027>hands<s%> that <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H5355>innocent<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%>,
A <S%H3820>heart<s%> that <S%H2790>devises<s%> <S%H205>wicked<s%> <S%H4284>imaginations<s%>, <S%H7272>feet<s%> that are <S%H4116>swift<s%> in <S%H7323>running<s%> to <S%H7451>mischief<s%>,
A <S%H8267>false<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%> that <S%H6315>speaks<s%> <S%H3577>lies<s%>, and he that <S%H7971>sows<s%> <S%H4090>discord<s%> among <S%H251>brothers<s%>.
My <S%H1121>son<s%>, <S%H5341>keep<s%> your <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H4687>commandment<s%>, and <S%H5203>forsake<s%> not the <S%H8451>law<s%> of your <S%H517>mother<s%>:
<S%H7194>Bind<s%> them <S%H8548>continually<s%> upon your <S%H3820>heart<s%>, and <S%H6029>tie<s%> them about your <S%H1621>neck<s%>.
When you <S%H1980>go<s%>, it shall <S%H5148>lead<s%> <S%H7901>you<s%>; when you sleep, it shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H6974>you<s%>; and when you awake, it shall talk with <S%H7878>you<s%>.

For the <S%H4687>commandment<s%> is a <S%H5216>lamp<s%>; and the <S%H8451>law<s%> is <S%H216>light<s%>; and <S%H8433>reproofs<s%> of <S%H4148>instruction<s%> are the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H2416>life<s%>:
To <S%H8104>keep<s%> you from the <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%>, from the <S%H2513>flattery<s%> of the <S%H3956>tongue<s%> of a strange <S%H5237>woman<s%>.
<S%H2530>Lust<s%> not after her <S%H3308>beauty<s%> in your <S%H3824>heart<s%>; neither let her <S%H3947>take<s%> you with her <S%H6079>eyelids<s%>.

For by means <S%H1157>of<s%> a <S%H2181>whorish<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%> a man is brought to a <S%H3603>piece<s%> of <S%H3899>bread<s%>: and the <S%H802>adulteress<s%> will <S%H6679>hunt<s%> for the <S%H3368>precious<s%> <S%H5315>life<s%>.
Can a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H2846>take<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> in his <S%H2436>bosom<s%>, and his <S%H899>clothes<s%> not be <S%H8313>burned<s%>?
Can <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H1980>go<s%> upon hot <S%H1513>coals<s%>, and his <S%H7272>feet<s%> not be <S%H3554>burned<s%>?
So he that goes <S%H935>in<s%> to his <S%H7453>neighbors<s%> <S%H802>wife<s%>; whoever <S%H5060>touches<s%> her shall not be <S%H5352>innocent<s%>.
Men do not <S%H936>despise<s%> a <S%H1590>thief<s%>, if he <S%H1589>steal<s%> to <S%H4390>satisfy<s%> his <S%H5315>soul<s%> when he is <S%H7456>hungry<s%>;
But if he be <S%H4672>found<s%>, he shall <S%H7999>restore<s%> <S%H7659>sevenfold<s%>; he shall <S%H5414>give<s%> all the <S%H1952>substance<s%> of his <S%H1004>house<s%>.
But whoever commits <S%H5003>adultery<s%> with a <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H2638>lacks<s%> <S%H3820>understanding<s%>: he that <S%H6213>does<s%> it <S%H7843>destroys<s%> his own <S%H5315>soul<s%>.
A <S%H5061>wound<s%> and <S%H7036>dishonor<s%> shall he <S%H4672>get<s%>; and his <S%H2781>reproach<s%> shall not be wiped <S%H4229>away<s%>.
For <S%H7068>jealousy<s%> is the <S%H2534>rage<s%> of a <S%H1397>man<s%>: therefore he will not <S%H2550>spare<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H5359>vengeance<s%>.
He will not <S%H5375>regard<s%> any <S%H3724>ransom<s%>; neither will he rest <S%H14>content<s%>, though you give <S%H7235>many<s%> <S%H7810>gifts<s%>.
